<!-- Code generated by generrordocs.go; DO NOT EDIT. -->

```
InvalidShiftOperand occurs when the shifted operand is not an integer.

Example:
 var s = "hello"
 var x = s {{raw "<"}}{{raw "<"}} 2
```
